attributes.action: Bring the Prime Minister to the House to apologise for misleading Parliament
attributes.additional_details: Failure to provide an effective Test, Track and Trace system was / is pivotal to our requirement to help control the spread of Covid19 and critical to determining the rate of infection, the R rate
attributes.background:
In May 2020 the PM claimed that there would be a " World Beating " track and trace system in place by the beginning of June 2020 

This is critical to defeating the Coronavirus

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Statements in the House of Commons are a matter for individual Members and not the House as a whole. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555502
